name: Farm of the dead
description:
This was going to be my entry to LD 52.
Unfortunately I ran into some issues at the time and couldn't submit

An endless arcade game where you have to harvest zombies before they get overripe

Controls :

Movement = Left and Right arrow keys

Attack overripe zombies = Space
Harvest ripe zombies = Down arrow + Space
Restart = R




Like what you see ? :) Follow me on Twitter Join our Discord
